RelatedSentence: Italy 's anti-trust and competition authority has launched an investigation to determine whether the commercial practices of online travel websites Booking.com and Expedia are limiting price competition .

Italy 's anti-trust and competition authority has launched an investigation to determine whether the commercial practices of online travel websites Booking.com and Expedia are limiting price competition .

The decision to place Booking.com and Expedia under investigation was taken at a 07 May meeting of the regulator after concerns were raised by the Italian hotels association Federalberghi , the Italian financial police and the Italian Association for Computers and Automated Calculation ( AICA ) .

The regulator said it would be looking into whether the online travel agencies Booking and Expedia limit price competition through agreements with hotels that condition pricing through other sales channels ( including the hotels ' own websites ) , preventing consumers from finding the best offers available .

The investigation will be concluded by 30 July 2015 , said the regulator in a statement .
